short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Links your Facebook Group Members to Google Sheet instantly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is helping marketers in increasing their email lists from Facebook groups. This helps in creating list in Google sheet, Active Campaign, SendFox, GetResponse, Constant Contact, Pipedrive and Mailchimp.
